overview:
Todd is a senior executive with extensive experience in sales, marketing, business development and operations. As a proven leader he has successfully executed a wide range of business models focused at the crossing market vectors of Mobile, Web and Media. Todd currently serves as SinglePoint’s Chief Operating Officer responsible for day to day operations while focusing on driving the company’s strategies to market execution.

Prior to his engagement with SinglePoint he has held leadership positions within Sales, Business Development and Client Operations in a number of market leading companies including: Syniverse, Boston Communications Group, Sony, Mitsubishi Wireless and McCaw Communications. Todd holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in Finance from Washington State University.
